title.narrative: Promoting good governance, transparency and accountability at the sub-national level to enable effective citizen participation, oversight and problem solving of service delivery.

description.narrative: Integrity Action grant to National Taxpayers Association to promote good governance, transparency and accountability at the sub-national level to enable effective citizen participation, oversight, problem solving and monitoring in the utilization of public funds and service delivery;

Overall Objective: The goal of the project is to contribute to the promotion of good governance, transparency and accountability in the management of public funds at the sub-national level through effective citizen participation, oversight, problem solving and monitoring.
Specific Objectives: A. To establish partnerships and project buy in with institutions at national and sub national for information sharing and redress mechanisms. B. To enhance the capacity of citizens to effectively monitor the management of public funds to ensure effective management of the public funds. C. To improve the quality of projects through the monitoring of projects in Uasin Gishu County, Turbo constituency using the CRCs.;
